text: Kunreuth is a municipality in the district of Forchheim in Bavaria in Germany. The town is the place of Schloss Kunreuth. Since the 14th century the castle has belonged to the family of the Counts and Barons von Egloffstein who have also owned Egloffstein Castle since the 12th century. ==References== Category:Forchheim (district)
title: Kunreuth
